root: ^Good morning, Zip. I've got some news.
^You're doing so well that you managed to make me look good to the bosses up top.
^They're promoting me to Director of Management.
^They also think you do so well that you don't need a manager overseeing you any more.
^I can't thank you enough for your hard work. It doesn't go without notice.
^Your customers love you and you helped me achieve something I never thought would happen in 1,000 years.
^Thanks for everything, Zip. Oh and before I go, I never did tell you my name.
^Feel free to look me up if you ever have a day off. See you around, Zip!
